subject: Presidents Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Webb Simpson and his partner, Bubba Watson, have won the first match on two consecutive days, giving the United States a 7-5 lead over the International team going into Round 3.
snippet: Webb Simpson and his partner, Bubba Watson, have won the first match on two consecutive days, giving the United States a 7-5 lead over the International team going into Round 3.
